sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Kbd-&kbd-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: as, ld, strip Bison: bison Diffutils: cmp Fileutils: cp, install, ln, mv, rm Flex: flex Gettext: msgfmt, xgettext Gcc: cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Grep: grep Gzip: gunzip, gzip Make: make Patch: patch Sed: sed Sh-utils: uname
